instruction: What kinds of spectrum were used to identify the storage age of Xinhui dried tangerine peel?
Output: Near infrared (NIR) spectroscopy is used to identify the storage age of Xinhui dried tangerine peel.

instruction: What spectral feature processing methods were employed to identify the storage age of Xinhui dried tangerine peel?
Output: Savitzky–Golay convolution smoothing, standard normal variate (SNV), first derivative, and second derivative pretreatments were employed for spectral feature processing in the study.

instruction: What metric was chosen in the study of identifying the storage age of Xinhui dried tangerine peel?
Output: The metric chosen in the study for identifying the storage age of Xinhui dried tangerine peel was discriminant accuracy.

instruction: What machine learning models were used in the study investigating the application of integrating a hand-held NIR spectrometer combined with machine learning to rapidly and accurately identify the storage age of Xinhui dried tangerine peel?
Output: The machine learning models used in the study were Support Vector Machine (SVM) and k-nearest neighbor.

instruction: How accurate was the SNV-PCA-SVM model in identifying the storage age of Xinhui dried tangerine peel when integrating a hand-held NIR spectrometer combined with machine learning?
Output: The SNV-PCA-SVM model had a discriminant accuracy of 99.60% in the validation set and 96.50% in the test set when integrating a hand-held NIR spectrometer combined with machine learning.
